events.text:
*end of demonstration.*
The Master is to have his assistant (AKA "the player") gather components for a ritual saying that they have accidently trapped themselves in their cauldron while doing an expirement.
The Master would eventually have the player choose a mundane every day item, the Master telling them it would be the intended target for the Master to store some of his life force should something unfortunate happen.
The reality is the Master plans to take the player's body for themselves and trap the player inside the object.
technical wants:
	interactable items within Master's hut that clue in to what their true objective is.
	alternate components to gather to trick the Master into being the one that is trapped in the chosen object.
